ingredients.item: 1 Thai red chilli (seeds in for more heat)
28g pack coriander, leaves finely chopped, stalks roughly chopped
2 tsp Cooks’ Ingredients Organic Curry Powder
400g can chopped Italian tomatoes with olive oil & garlic
400g cod fillet, cut into chunky slices
180g pack raw extra large king prawns

instructions.step: Cook the rice according to pack instructions. Meanwhile, put the shallots, lemongrass, shrimp paste, chilli and coriander stalks into a small processor with 1 tsp oil and whizz to form a smooth paste.

Heat 1 tsp oil in a frying pan, then add the paste and curry powder and cook for 2 minutes until fragrant. Add the tomatoes and half a can of water, then cover and simmer for 5 minutes until the sauce thickens. Stir in the spinach and most of the coriander, then season.

Drop in the cod and prawns. Re-cover, then simmer for 3 minutes until the fish is cooked through and the prawns are pink and opaque throughout. Scatter with the rest of the coriander, then serve with the rice.
